item.title: Getting setup for development (CentOS)
item.description: At work we’ll often do ‘group testing’ sessions or ‘internal hackathons’. What struck me about the last one was that setting up your development environment can surprisingly tricky, especailly if it’s for a style of development or langage you don’t generally use. TL;DR: gist of commands What are we developing for? The setup we are going for here, is a Node.js and Java environment using VSCode - with a view to using the IBM Blockchain Platform extension for writing applications and smart contracts for Hyperledger Fabric
